sourcesContent:
<template>
  <vue-winwheel :segments="items" ref="wins" @numeroGanador="numeroGanador" />
</template>

<script>
import VueWinwheel from "vue-winwheel-reversion/vue-winwheel";

export default {
  name: "sss-ss",
  components: {
    VueWinwheel,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      // pageTitle: "Vue-Wheel",
      // wheelSize: 400,
      // btnColor: "",
      // btnText: "",
      // lineWidth: 3,
      // duration: 5,
      // spin: 5,
      items: [],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    numeroGanador(datos) {
      console.log(datos);
    },
    iniciarJuego() {
      this.$refs.wins.startSpin();
      this.$refs.wins.establecerNumeroGanador(10);
    },
    crearRangoNumeros(){
      let elems = []
      
      for(let num of 10){
        elems.push( {
          textFillStyle: "#fff",
          fillStyle: "#000",
          text: num.toString(),
        });
      }

      this.items = elems;
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    setTimeout(() => {
    }, 2000);
  },
};
</script>
